00032 #include "OFEvaluator.hpp"
00033 #include "MsqError.hpp"
00034 #include "ObjectiveFunction.hpp"
00035 
00036 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00037 
00038 
00039 OFEvaluator::OFEvaluator( ObjectiveFunction* of ) : OF(of), doBCD(false)
00040   { }
00041 
00042 
00043 bool OFEvaluator::initialize( MeshDomainAssoc* mesh_and_domain,
00044                               const Settings* settings,
00045                               PatchSet* user_set,
00046                               MsqError& err )
00047 {
00048   if (doBCD) {
00049     tempType = ObjectiveFunction::TEMPORARY;
00050     firstType = ObjectiveFunction::SAVE;
00051     updateType = ObjectiveFunction::UPDATE;
00052   }
00053   else {
00054     tempType = firstType = updateType = ObjectiveFunction::CALCULATE;
00055   }
00056   reset();
00057 
00058   if (!doBCD) // Nash
00059     return true;
00060   
00061   if (!have_objective_function()) {
00062     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Cannot perform block coordinate descent algorithm"
00063                     " without an ObjectiveFunction", MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00064     return false;
00065   }
00066   
00067   bool result = get_objective_function()->
00068     initialize_block_coordinate_descent( mesh_and_domain, settings, user_set, err );
00069   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && result;
00070 }
00071 
00072 void OFEvaluator::initialize_queue( MeshDomainAssoc* mesh_and_domain,
00073                                     const Settings* settings,
00074                                     MsqError& err )
00075 {
00076   if (get_objective_function())
00077     get_objective_function()->initialize_queue( mesh_and_domain, settings, err );
00078   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00079 }
00080 
00081 bool OFEvaluator::reset() 
00082 {
00083   currUpdateType = firstType;
00084   return true;
00085 }
00086 
00087 bool OFEvaluator::update( PatchData& pd, double& value, MsqError& err )
00088 {
00089   if (!have_objective_function()) 
00090     { MSQ_SETERR(err)("No ObjectiveFunction",MsqError::INVALID_STATE); return false; }
00091   bool b = get_objective_function()
00092     ->evaluate( currUpdateType, pd, value, OF_FREE_EVALS_ONLY, err );
00093   currUpdateType = updateType;
00094   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && b;
00095 }
00096 
00097 
00098 bool OFEvaluator::update( PatchData& pd, double& value, 
00099                           std::vector<Vector3D>& grad,
00100                           MsqError& err )
00101 {
00102   if (!have_objective_function()) 
00103     { MSQ_SETERR(err)("No ObjectiveFunction",MsqError::INVALID_STATE); return false; }
00104   bool b = get_objective_function()
00105     ->evaluate_with_gradient( currUpdateType, pd, value, grad, err );
00106   currUpdateType = updateType;
00107   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && b;
00108 }
00109 
00110 
00111 bool OFEvaluator::update( PatchData& pd, double& value, 
00112                           std::vector<Vector3D>& grad,
00113                           std::vector<SymMatrix3D>& hess_diag,
00114                           MsqError& err )
00115 {
00116   if (!have_objective_function()) 
00117     { MSQ_SETERR(err)("No ObjectiveFunction",MsqError::INVALID_STATE); return false; }
00118   bool b = get_objective_function()
00119     ->evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( currUpdateType, pd, value, grad, hess_diag, err );
00120   currUpdateType = updateType;
00121   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && b;
00122 }

00139 bool OFEvaluator::evaluate( PatchData& pd, double& value, MsqError& err ) const
00140 { 
00141   if (!have_objective_function()) 
00142     { MSQ_SETERR(err)("No ObjectiveFunction",MsqError::INVALID_STATE); return false; }
00143   bool b = get_objective_function()->evaluate( tempType, pd, value, OF_FREE_EVALS_ONLY, err ); 
00144   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && b;
00145 }

00154   bool b = get_objective_function()
00155     ->evaluate_with_gradient( tempType, pd, value, grad, err ); 
00156   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && b;

00174                             std::vector<Vector3D>& grad,

00180   bool b = get_objective_function()
